trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> och <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> händelser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>händelser inträffar när tillgängligheten till nätverket ändras.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: NetworkAvailableEventArgs contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAvailableEventArgs innehåller det nya läget i nätverksanslutningen.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få det aktuella tillståndet för nätverksanslutningen kan använda den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>händelser inträffar när tillgängligheten till nätverket ändras.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få det aktuella tillståndet för nätverksanslutningen kan använda den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som anger om nätverket är tillgänglig för programmet.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om nätverket är tillgänglig för programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>händelser inträffar när tillgängligheten till nätverket ändras.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få det aktuella tillståndet för nätverksanslutningen kan använda den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som anger om nätverket är tillgänglig för programmet.</xref:System.Boolean>
